_meanings:
{@--2@} (The
space) Between the thumb and the
forefinger, supposed to be sacred
to the Manes, as water &c. in 
ceremonies like {#tarpaRa#} is offered to them
being poured down through that
space; {#pradeSinyaMguzWayoraMtarA apasalavi#} 
{#apasavyaM vA tena pitfByo nidaDAti#} <ls>Śabdak.</ls>
